content: description learn how to crochet an easy dog scarf perfect for beginners using worsted-weight yarn and simple single_crochet stitches this step-by-step guide clearly explains how to create a cute scarf suitable for small to large dogs yarn drops nepal yarn or similar worsted weight yarn x 1 ball in olive crochet hook size 5 mm / us h-8 crochet hook skills level basic sizing depending on the size of the dog the length of the scarf will vary
